p: Amongst diterpenoids detected in the EtOAc extracts of native dried roots of S. abrotanoides [ 25], cryptotanshinone, 1Î²OH-cryptotanshinone, and 1-oxocryptotanshinone were found in methanolic root extracts of both S. yangii and S. abrotanoides. 1-oxomiltirone, found in both previous studies [ 25, 44], was not detected in this work.
